00025 #ifndef BOOZ_PWM_ARCH_H
00026 #define BOOZ_PWM_ARCH_H
00027 
00028 #include "std.h"
00029 #include "sys_time.h"
00030 
00031 extern void booz_pwm_init_arch(void);
00032 
00033 // Default PWM is PWM0
00034 #define BoozSetPwmValue(_v) BoozSetPwm0Value(_v)
00035 
00036 #define BoozSetPwm0Value(_v) { \
00037   PWMMR5 = SYS_TICS_OF_USEC(_v); \
00038   PWMLER = PWMLER_LATCH5; \
00039 }
00040 
00041 #define BoozSetPwm1Value(_v) { \
00042   PWMMR2 = SYS_TICS_OF_USEC(_v); \
00043   PWMLER = PWMLER_LATCH2; \
00044 }
00045 
00046 #endif /* BOOZ_PWM_ARCH_H */
